most-kills.text: If you have the most kill tokens at the end of the game, you gain 5 bonus points

most-male-heirs.text: If you have the most male heirs in play at the end of the game, you gain 2 bonus points

most-heirs.text: If you have the most heirs in play at the end of the game, you gain 2 bonus points

same-religion.text: If you have the same religion as Henry VII at the end of the game, you gain 2 bonus points

survived.text: If you are alive at the end of the game, you gain 2 bonus points

divorced.text: If you are divorced at the end of the game, you gain 1 bonus points
